name: Zoo Cleaner
description:
This game will allow you to plunge headlong into the work of a zoo cleaner at breakneck speed. You have to clean out all the sewage of this zoo and the most important thing is not to fall into the clutches of dangerous animals!

In a first person survival game, you have to clear the zoo from the mud. You need to clean all the enclosures and in no case get caught by the animal. You must clean up the enclosures so that no animal will notice you!


  • Good graphics
  • Excellent plot
  • Professional voice acting
